articles.title: Viktor's joy short-lived in European meet after tested Covid-19 positive - The Star Online
articles.description: PETALING JAYA: Defending champion Viktor Axelsen's joy was short-lived after checking into the men's singles final at the European Championships in Kyiv in Ukraine yesterday.
articles.content:
PETALING JAYA: Defending champion Viktor Axelsen's joy was short-lived after checking into the men's singles final at the European Championships in Kyiv in Ukraine yesterday.

articles.title: Boost for Springboks as Handre Pollard completes injury return for Montpellier - News24
articles.description: South Africa's Rugby World Cup winner Handre Pollard made his first appearance since September as Montpellier reached the European Challenge Cup final on Saturday.
articles.content:
South Africa's Rugby World Cup winner Handre Pollard made his first appearance since September as Montpellier reached the European Challenge Cup final with a 19-10 win at Bath on Saturday.
